message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $100. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway at $110.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm still interested in selling the product to you, but I need to make a living. I'm willing to meet you at $95, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm starting to feel like we're getting a bit too far apart. I'm willing to meet you at $92, but I'm not going any lower than that.
I'm not willing to go above $87. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm getting a bit worried that we're running out of time, but I'm still willing to work with you. I can meet you at $90, but that's my final offer.
I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go as high as $88. Can you meet me at that price?
